document.full_text: a silver miner trapped more than a mile underground since a cave-in nine days ago in northern idaho is now presumed to have perished in the accident, mining company executives said on sunday.
document.title: idaho miner trapped for nine days presumed dead
lines_and_colors: a silver miner trapped more than a mile underground since a cave-in nine days ago in northern idaho is now presumed to have perished in the accident, mining company executives said on sunday.
